idea:
AutoBox is an Auto-Tech start-up from Mumbai, India focusing on the Indian automotive domain in its Phase I, enabling the car owner a hassle-free experience for the entire ownership lifecycle; from pre-purchase, purchase to post purchase.

AutoBox envisions to be the market leader in the connected car space with IoT and Connected Car tech for all brands under one roof, instantaneously upgrading ones existing car to a SMART car with a cost-effective plug & play device.
name: AutoBox App

idea: BiCXO is a business intelligence solution primarily focussed at SME sector to increase BI adoption and thus enhance insights and decision making capabilities leading to improved business performance. BiCXO is the only Assisted BI solution in the BI space. BiCXO offers unlimited users and unlimited reports without any implementation and customisation charges for the customer thus helping customers adopt BI without any investment
name: BiCXO

idea:
MS LOCAL MEDIA PVT LTD is the owner of 'My Surrounding - Palghar District' mobile application.  This app provide local news, local search Engine, Discount offers, advertisement and many more.

People will get every update of Palghar district’s Urban as well as rural areas on your fingertips.



App Features:

• New:

*get updated with local news, govt notifications, electricity notifications, articles etc via push notifications.

*Local News reporters can share their news to get more reach.

*All these news, articles etc can be shared on social media platforms. Also user can save any news and view saved news in ‘My feed’ tab anytime. 

• Local Search:

*More than 230 subcategories in which we covered almost every daily necessary and important emergency facilities. User will get information about all nearby shops, freelancers, small/large scale businesses’ like contact number, address, photos, videos, ratings on their fingertips.

*For the convenience of the users, we provide ‘Search option’ to search any sub category or any shop by its name or location. Also user can see these shops/business according to ratings which are given by other users of this app.

*Vendors can specify (describe) about their shop in 400 words in the description box.

* Vendors can use ‘List your business’ button and directly give their Shop/Business information to My Surrounding.

*Users can save their favourite shops and access it anytime in a ‘Favourites’ section.


• Tennis Cricket:

*We provide platform to Tennis Cricketers and cricket team owners of Palghar district in which they can make their Cricket profile. Players and team owners can edit their profile any time.

*This is the first ever mobile application in which records of Palghar District Tennis Cricket Players are maintained and one can see all these statistics anytime for free.

*We have some wonderful cricket features like:

(1) Monthly Ranking for best 5 batsmen/bowlers/Teams.

(2) Information of Current Tournaments, Upcoming Tournaments and Recent Tournaments.

(3) Geolocation of the Ground, Organiser’s contact Information and many more.

(4) Contact information of Umpire, Commentators, Live Streaming Channels, Cricket Accessories Shops.

 


• Advertisement Bar:

*Local Shops, Vendors can publish their advertisement in the Advertisement bar. After clicking on this bar advertisement will be expand and user can get clickable mobile number, Email ID etc of the shop.

*We have special feature here for the vendors through which their shop’s advertisement will be shown to their targeted customer group only.



• No Language Barrier:

*For the convenience of users all these News, Government Notifications, Categories and 230+ Subcategories and everything in this app are available in three languages that is Marathi, English & Hindi.

*User can change language preference anytime.


• Blood Requirement:

*If a patient is in need of blood then they can provide us with appropriate details and this would be immediately forwarded to nearby blood donors.


We will add many more useful features like (1)Offers & Discount, (2)buying & selling of used stuff, (3)Entertainment, (4)Local polling etc for the people living in urban as well as rural area of Palghar district in short time.

Our aim is to provide best services to the users of rural as well as urban area of the palghar district and make their lifestyle easier.


All these shops/businesses/vendors/advertisers will have to pay some amount for yearly subscription.

For the users this application will be free of cost.

For more details visit: www.mysurrounding.in
name: My Surrounding - Palghar District

idea:
Strictly Electric was conceptualized in 2019 with a vision to increase the adoption of electric vehicles in Indian Market Place. In 2021 Strictly Electric Automobiles Pvt. Ltd was incorporated after developing our Flagship Product 'EasyKit'. EasyKit converts Any bicycle to electric in less than 20 mins in a completely DIY manner. Our product is due to be launched around June 2021 in the Indian Market. Currently, the product has been prototyped and the mass production stage is being developed. We also have validated our design with interested users in India via our website www.strictlyelectric.in and in-person surveys. 


We are in talks with investors and an initial pre-seed funding round is almost completed. This funding will allow us to launch the pre-booking of our kit in India. 


Along with this, we are also launching the first-of-its-kind servicing and AMC service center completely dedicated to Electric 2 wheelers in our Dadar Experience Center (Currently Under Development).
name: STRICTLY ELECTRIC AUTOMOBILES PRIVATE LIMITED
